remarks: Express a singleton function in maps-to notation.  Deduction form of ~ fmptsng .  (Contributed by AV, 4-Aug-2019.)
statement:
fmptsnd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> B = C ) $.
fmptsnd.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
fmptsnd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. W ) $.
fmptsnd $p |- ( ph -> { <. A , C >. } = ( x e. { A } |-> B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
